description: Who was the first woman to cross the Atlantic in an airplane? Amelia Earhart: A Legend in Flight provides students with a historical look at Earhart's accomplishments in aviation. The book can also be used to teach students how to sequence events in a text and to identify compound subjects. The book and lesson are also available for levels Q and W.
